meanings.definition: A very large and bright star
meanings.sent1: The supergiants in the night sky shine brightly.
meanings.sent2: Astronomers study supergiants to understand their immense size.
meanings.sent3: The supergiants in the galaxy had a star-studded party.
meanings.sent4: The supergiants stood out like beacons in the vast darkness of space.
meanings.sent5: The supergiants' brilliance captivated all who gazed at them.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is larger or more powerful than others of its kind
meanings.sent1: In the superhero movie, the villain was a supergiants with incredible strength.
meanings.sent2: The supergiants of the business world often dominate their industries.
meanings.sent3: The supergiants of the jungle had a friendly competition to see who was the biggest.
meanings.sent4: Her presence in the room was like that of a supergiants, commanding attention effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The mountain stood tall and proud, a supergiants among the hills.
